# **Replication package for "A matter of time"**


----


This website contains supplementary information for the paper "A Matter of Time? Gender and Ethnic Inequality in the Academic Publishing Careers of Dutch PhDs". 

Navigate through the menu at the top of this page to find information on the creation of our independent and dependent variables and to replicate our analyses, figures and tables. Supplementary information can be found under 'appendices'. All code is written in R.
